languages.text: {n}Вы бросаете взгляд на толпу... и вдруг замечаете скомороха: кривляющийся шут мелькает среди собравшихся, явно стараясь не попасться вам на глаза.{/n}
{n}You glance at the crowd... and suddenly see the fool, prancing and flitting among the gawkers, clearly trying not to be spotted by you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы бросаете взгляд на толпу... и вдруг замечаете скомороха: кривляющийся шут мелькает среди собравшихся, явно стараясь не попасться вам на глаза.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You glance at the crowd... And suddenly see a jester, a prancing clown flitting among the gawkers, clearly trying not to be spotted by you.{/n}
{n}You glance at the crowd... And suddenly see a jester, a prancing clown flitting among the gawkers, clearly trying not to be spotted by you.{/n}
{n}You glance at the crowd... and suddenly see a jester, a prancing clown flitting among the gawkers, clearly trying not to be spotted by you.{/n}
{n}You glance at the crowd... and suddenly see a jester, a prancing clown flitting among the gawkers, clearly trying not to be spotted by you.{/n}
{n}You glance at the crowd... and suddenly see the fool, prancing and flitting among the gawkers, clearly trying not to be spotted by you.{/n}
{n}You glance at the crowd... and suddenly see the fool, prancing and flitting among the gawkers, clearly trying not to be spotted by you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你瞥了一眼人群……随后突然看到了那个小丑。他在围观的人群中蹦蹦跳跳，显然一点都不想引起你的注意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You glance at the crowd... and suddenly see the fool, prancing and flitting among the gawkers, clearly trying not to be spotted by you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你瞥了一眼人群……随后突然看到了那个小丑。他在围观的人群中蹦蹦跳跳，显然一点都不想引起你的注意。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Observas a la muchedumbre... y de repente ves al bufón, brincando y correteando entre el gentío en un evidente esfuerzo por ocultarse de ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You glance at the crowd... and suddenly see the fool, prancing and flitting among the gawkers, clearly trying not to be spotted by you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Observas a la muchedumbre... y de repente ves al bufón, brincando y correteando entre el gentío en un evidente esfuerzo por ocultarse de ti.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kalabalığa göz atıyorsun... Aniden soytarıyı, seyircilerin arasında hoplayıp zıplarken görüyorsun. Sana görünmemek için çabaladığını fark ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You glance at the crowd... and suddenly see the fool, prancing and flitting among the gawkers, clearly trying not to be spotted by you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kalabalığa göz atıyorsun... Aniden soytarıyı, seyircilerin arasında hoplayıp zıplarken görüyorsun. Sana görünmemek için çabaladığını fark ediyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは群衆に目をやり…突然、その道化が野次馬の間を跳ね回り、かろやかに動いているのを目にする。明らかにあなたに見つからないようにしている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You glance at the crowd... and suddenly see the fool, prancing and flitting among the gawkers, clearly trying not to be spotted by you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは群衆に目をやり…突然、その道化が野次馬の間を跳ね回り、かろやかに動いているのを目にする。明らかにあなたに見つからないようにしている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous parcourez la foule du regard... et soudain, vous apercevez le bouffon qui se faufile en sautillant parmi les spectateurs, cherchant de toute évidence à échapper à votre attention.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You glance at the crowd... and suddenly see the fool, prancing and flitting among the gawkers, clearly trying not to be spotted by you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous parcourez la foule du regard... et soudain, vous apercevez le bouffon qui se faufile en sautillant parmi les spectateurs, cherchant de toute évidence à échapper à votre attention.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du blickst auf die Menge ... und siehst plötzlich den Narren, der zwischen den Schaulustigen tänzelt ... offenbar, um nicht von dir gesehen zu werden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You glance at the crowd... and suddenly see the fool, prancing and flitting among the gawkers, clearly trying not to be spotted by you.{/n}
